verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Amraphel <S%H569><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Shinar, <S%H8152><s%> Arioch <S%H746><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Ellasar, <S%H495><s%> Chedorlaomer <S%H3540><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Elam, <S%H5867><s%> and Tidal <S%H8413><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Goiim, <S%H9074><s%>

[that] they made <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> with Bera <S%H1298><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> and with Birsha <S%H1306><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> Shinab <S%H8134><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Admah, <S%H126><s%> and Shemeber <S%H8038><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Zeboiim, <S%H6636><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bela <S%H9055><s%> (that is, Zoar <S%H6820><s%>).
All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> came <S%H2266><s%> as allies <S%H2266><s%> to the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Siddim <S%H7708><s%> (that is, the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%>).

Twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> they had served <S%H5647><s%> Chedorlaomer, <S%H3540><s%> but the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> they rebelled. <S%H4775><s%>

And in the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> Chedorlaomer <S%H3540><s%> and the kings <S%H4428><s%> that were with him, came <S%H935><s%> and defeated <S%H5221><s%> the Rephaim <S%H7497><s%> in Ashteroth-karnaim and the Zuzim <S%H2104><s%> in Ham <S%H1990><s%> and the Emim <S%H368><s%> in Shaveh-kiriathaim,
and the Horites <S%H2752><s%> in their Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as El-paran, which <S%H834><s%> is by the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

Then they turned <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to En-mishpat (that is, Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>), and conquered <S%H5221><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the country <S%H7704><s%> of the Amalekites, <S%H6003><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Hazazon-tamar.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Admah <S%H126><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Zeboiim <S%H6636><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bela <S%H9055><s%> (that is, Zoar <S%H6820><s%>) came <S%H3318><s%> out; and they arrayed <S%H6186><s%> for battle <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H854><s%> them in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Siddim, <S%H7708><s%>

against <S%H854><s%> Chedorlaomer <S%H3540><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Elam <S%H5867><s%> and Tidal <S%H8413><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Goiim <S%H9074><s%> and Amraphel <S%H569><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Shinar <S%H8152><s%> and Arioch <S%H746><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Ellasar <S%H495><s%> â€“ four <S%H702><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> against <S%H854><s%> five. <S%H2568><s%>

Now the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Siddim <S%H7708><s%> was full of tar <S%H2564><s%> pits; <S%H875><s%> and the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%> fled, <S%H5127><s%> and they fell <S%H5307><s%> into them. But those who survived <S%H7604><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> to the hill <S%H2022><s%> country. <S%H2022><s%>

Then they took <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the goods <S%H7399><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their food <S%H400><s%> supply, <S%H400><s%> and departed. <S%H1980><s%>

And they also took <S%H3947><s%> Lot, <S%H3876><s%> Abram's nephew, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H251><s%> and his possessions <S%H7399><s%> and departed, <S%H1980><s%> for he was living <S%H3427><s%> in Sodom. <S%H5467><s%>

Then a fugitive <S%H6412><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> the Hebrew. <S%H5680><s%> Now he was living <S%H7931><s%> by the oaks <S%H436><s%> of Mamre <S%H4471><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> of Eshcol <S%H812><s%> and brother <S%H251><s%> of Aner, <S%H6063><s%> and these <S%H1992><s%> were allies <S%H1167><s%> <S%H1285><s%> with Abram. <S%H87><s%>

And when Abram <S%H87><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that his relative <S%H251><s%> had been taken <S%H7617><s%> captive, <S%H7617><s%> he led <S%H9553><s%> out his trained <S%H2593><s%> men, <S%H2593><s%> born <S%H3211><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and eighteen, <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> and went <S%H7291><s%> in pursuit <S%H7291><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Dan. <S%H1835><s%>

And he divided <S%H2505><s%> his forces against <S%H5921><s%> them by night, <S%H3915><s%> he and his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and defeated <S%H5221><s%> them, and pursued <S%H7291><s%> them as far <S%H5704><s%> as Hobah, <S%H2327><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is north <S%H8040><s%> of Damascus. <S%H1834><s%>

And he brought <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the goods, <S%H7399><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> brought <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> his relative <S%H251><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> with his possessions, <S%H7399><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> the women, <S%H802><s%> and the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Then after <S%H310><s%> his return <S%H7725><s%> from the defeat <S%H5221><s%> of Chedorlaomer <S%H3540><s%> and the kings <S%H4428><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were with him, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H7122><s%> him at the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Shaveh <S%H7740><s%> (that is, the King's Valley <S%H6010><s%>).

And Melchizedek <S%H4442><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Salem <S%H8004><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> out bread <S%H3899><s%> and wine; <S%H3196><s%> now he was a priest <S%H3548><s%> of God <S%H410><s%> Most <S%H9411><s%> High. <S%H9411><s%>

And he blessed <S%H1288><s%> him and said, <S%H559><s%> "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Abram <S%H87><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> Most <S%H9411><s%> High, <S%H9411><s%> Possessor <S%H7069><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth; <S%H776><s%>

And blessed <S%H1288><s%> be God <S%H430><s%> Most <S%H9411><s%> High, <S%H9411><s%> Who <S%H834><s%> has delivered <S%H4042><s%> your enemies <S%H6862><s%> into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>" And he gave <S%H5414><s%> him a tenth <S%H4643><s%> of all. <S%H3605><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> "Give <S%H5414><s%> the people <S%H5315><s%> to me and take <S%H3947><s%> the goods <S%H7399><s%> for yourself."

And Abram <S%H87><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> "I have sworn <S%H7311><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> Most <S%H9411><s%> High, <S%H9411><s%> possessor <S%H7069><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth, <S%H776><s%>

that I will not take <S%H3947><s%> a thread <S%H2339><s%> or a sandal <S%H5275><s%> thong <S%H8288><s%> or anything <S%H3605><s%> that is yours, lest <S%H3808><s%> you should say, <S%H559><s%> 'I have made <S%H6238><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> rich. <S%H6238><s%>'

"I will take nothing <S%H1107><s%> except <S%H1107><s%> what <S%H834><s%> the young <S%H5288><s%> men <S%H5288><s%> have eaten, <S%H398><s%> and the share <S%H2506><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> with me, Aner, <S%H6063><s%> Eshcol, <S%H812><s%> and Mamre; <S%H4471><s%> let them take <S%H3947><s%> their share. <S%H2506><s%>"
